analyzed: sakkena abhinimmito  pavane sīha byagghe ca
translated: created by Sakka in the forest,🔽I extended loving-kindness
to lions and tigers in the jungle.

analyzed: sīha byagghehi dīpīhi  acchehi mahisehi ca
translated: Surrounded by lions, tigers,🔽panthers, and buffaloes,
and I was not afraid of anyone.
Supported by the power of loving-kindness,
I delighted in the forest.”🔽The Story of Suvaṇṇasāma is the thirteenth.
